content: toe-up baby socks a pattern by sheila stromberg needles 4 size us 2 2 75 mm double-­ point needles yarn 40 65 90 yards of light sock weight yarn notions tapestry needle to weave in ends gauge 7 stitches and 11 row = 1 inch finished sizes 0-­ 3 months 3 -­ 6 months 6 months -­ 1 year yield unstretched socks measuring 3 ¼ 3 ¾ 4 ¼ techniques judy s magic cast on wrap and turn and jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off http //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html http //www purlbee com/short-­ row-­ tutorial/ http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php toe -­ using judy s magic cast on cast on 8 stitches over 2 needles begin working in the round 8 stitches -­ knit in the front and back of each stitch around 16 stitches -­ knit 1 row -­ knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch repeat around 24 stitches -­ stop increases here for size 0-­ 3 months -­ knit 1 row -­ knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 8 stitches knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 2 repeat from to once more knit 1 28 stitches -­ stop increases here for size 3-­ 6 months -­ knit 1 row -­ knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 10 stitches knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 2 repeat from to once more knit 1 32 stitches foot -­ work in stockinette stitch until sock measures 2 2 ½ 3 from cast on edge or about 1 1 ¼ less than desired length heel -­ begin working back and forth in short row work on first 12 14 16 stitches of the row the remaining stitches will be on hold for the leg knit 11 13 15 stitches wrap the following stitch and turn -­ purl 10 12 14 stitches wrap the following stitch and turn -­ knit until 1 stitch before the next wrapped stitch wrap the following stitch and turn -­ purl until 1 stitch before the next wrapped stitch wrap the following stitch and turn -­ continue to wrap and turn until there are 4 6 6 stitches not wrapped in the middle of the heel ending after a purl row -­ begin unwrapping stitches knit to the first wrapped stitch pick up the wrap and knit it together with the wrapped stitch turn -­ slip 1 stitch purl to the first wrapped stitch pick up the wrap and purl it together with the wrapped stitch turn -­ slip 1 stitch knit to the first wrapped stitch pick up the wrap and purl it together with the wrapped stitch turn -­ continue unwrapping each stitch in this manner one at a time until all stitches have been worked stitch count will be restored to 24 28 32 stitches leg -­ resume working in the round knit to 1 stitch
